name: bulbasaur
move_1_description: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger."

name: ivysaur
move_1_description: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "There is a plant bulb on its back. When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said to blossom into a large flower."

name: venusaur
ability: All Energy attached to this Pokemon are Grass Energy instead of their usual type.
flavor_text: "A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle."

name: charmander
move_2_description: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out."

name: charmeleon
move_2_description: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe. It then tears up the fallen opponent with sharp claws."

name: charizard
ability: All Energy attached to this Pokemon are Fire Energy instead of their usual type.
move_1_description: Discard 3 Energy attached to this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures."

name: squirtle
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
flavor_text: "When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force."

name: wartortle
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks during your opponent’s next turn.
flavor_text: "This Pokémon is very popular as a pet. Its fur-covered tail is a symbol of its longevity."

name: blastoise
ability: All Energy attached to this Pokemon are Water Energy instead of their usual type.
move_1_description: This attack does 10 additional damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell."

name: caterpie
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
flavor_text: "It is covered with a green skin. When it grows, it sheds the skin, covers itself with silk, and becomes a cocoon."

name: metapod
move_1_description: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
flavor_text: "Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can't withstand a harsh attack."

name: butterfree
move_1_description: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokemon.
move_2_description: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
flavor_text: "The wings are protected by rain-repellent dust. As a result, this Pokémon can fly about even in rain."

name: weedle
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
flavor_text: "Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head."

name: kakuna
move_1_description: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
flavor_text: "This Pokémon is in a temporary stage while making its body. It is almost completely unable to move on its own."

name: beedrill
move_1_description: Your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
move_2_description: This attack does 40 damage times the number of Beedrill you have in play to 1 of your opponent’s Pokemon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
flavor_text: "May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear."

name: pidgey
move_1_description: Before doing damage, discard all Pokemon Tool cards attached to your opponent’s Active Pokemon.
flavor_text: "Does not like to fight. It hides in tall grass and so on, foraging for food such as small bugs."

name: pidgeotto
flavor_text: "The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an EXEGGCUTE to its nest over 60 miles away."

name: pidgeot
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
move_2_description: During your next turn, this Pokemon’s Strong Gust attack does 60 more damage.
flavor_text: "It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate enemies. It races through the skies at Mach-2 speed."

name: rattata
ability: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
flavor_text: "Its fangs are long and very sharp. They grow continuously, so it gnaws on hard things to whittle them down."

name: raticate
move_1_description: Discard an Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokemon.
move_2_description: This attack does 60 damage times the number of Special Energy cards in your opponent’s discard pile.
flavor_text: "Its rear feet have three toes each. They are webbed, enabling it to swim across rivers."

name: spearow
move_2_description: If this Pokemon was attacked last turn, use that attack on the Defending Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It busily flits around here and there. Even if it is frail, it can be a tough foe that uses MIRROR MOVE."

name: fearow
move_2_description: If this Pokemon was attacked last turn, use that attack on the Defending Pokemon.
flavor_text: "Its huge and magnificent wings can keep it aloft in the sky. It can remain flying a whole day without landing."

name: ekans
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
flavor_text: "A very common sight in grassland, etc. It flicks its tongue in and out to sense danger in its surroundings."

name: arbok
ability: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s attacks do 30 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
move_1_description: Your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
flavor_text: "The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern."

name: pikachu
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 10 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs."

name: raichu
move_1_description: Attach a Electric Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokemon.
move_2_description: You may discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 70 more damage.
flavor_text: "Its electric charges can reach even 100,000 volts. Careless contact can cause even an Indian elephant to faint."

name: sandshrew
move_1_description: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent’s next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
flavor_text: "It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection."

name: sandslash
move_2_description: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent’s Active Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It is adept at attacking with the spines on its back and its sharp claws while quickly scurrying about."

name: nidoran-f
move_1_description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "Though small, it must be treated with caution because of its powerfully toxic barbs. The female has smaller horns."

name: nidorina
move_1_description: The defending pokemon is now Poisoned.
move_2_description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "The female has a gentle temperament. It emits ultrasonic cries that have the power to befuddle foes."

name: nidoqueen
move_1_description: The defending pokemon is now Poisoned.
move_2_description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.
flavor_text: "The body is covered by stiff, needle- like scales. If it becomes excited, the needles bristle outwards."

name: nidoran-m
move_1_description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "Its large ears are flapped like wings when it is listening to distant sounds. It extends toxic barbs when angered."

name: nidorino
move_2_description: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "It is easily angered. By swinging its well- developed horn wildly, it can even punch through diamond."

name: nidoking
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
move_2_description: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokemon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
flavor_text: "It is recognized by its rock-hard hide and its extended horn. Be careful with the horn as it contains venom."

name: clefairy
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Asleep.
move_2_description: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Active Pokemon’s attacks and use it as this attack.
flavor_text: "Its adorable appearance makes it popular as a pet. However, it is rare and difficult to find."

name: clefable
move_1_description: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Active Pokemon’s attacks and use it as this attack.
move_2_description: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
flavor_text: "It has an acute sense of hearing. It can easily hear a pin being dropped nearly 1,100 yards away."

name: vulpix
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Confused.
flavor_text: "While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted."

name: ninetales
move_1_description: Switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokemon with his or her Active Pokemon. The new Active Pokemon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
move_2_description: Discard a F Energy attached to this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It has nine long tails and fur that  gleams gold. It is said to live for  1,000 years."

name: jigglypuff
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
flavor_text: "It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody."

name: wigglytuff
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
move_2_description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "Its fur is extremely fine, dense, and supple. The exquisitely pleasant fur conveys an image of luxury."

name: zubat
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
move_2_description: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echo location to flit about in darkness."

name: golbat
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
flavor_text: "It clamps down on its prey with needle- sharp fangs and drains over 10 ounces of blood in one gulp."

name: oddish
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
move_2_description: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon named Oddish and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
flavor_text: "Its scientific name is 'Oddium Wanderus.' At night, it is said to walk nearly 1,000 feet on its two roots."

name: gloom
move_1_description: Both this Pokemon and the Defending Pokemon are now Confused.
move_2_description: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
flavor_text: "Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles."

name: vileplume
ability: Apply Weakness for each Pokemon (both yours and your opponent’s) as x4 instead.
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned.
flavor_text: "Its petals are the largest in the world. It fiendishly scatters allergy-causing pollen from its petals."

name: paras
move_2_description: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
flavor_text: "Growing out of the bug's back are mushrooms called tochukaso. The mushrooms grow with the bug host."

name: parasect
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
move_2_description: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It scatters toxic spores from the mushroom cap. In China, the spores are used as herbal medicine."

name: venonat
move_1_description: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Confused.
flavor_text: "Its eyes act as radar, enabling it to be active in darkness. The eyes can also shoot powerful beams."

name: venomoth
ability: Prevent all effects of attacks, except damage, done to Venomoth by your opponent’s Pokemon.
move_1_description: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.
flavor_text: "The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust."

name: diglett
ability: As long as this Pokemon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks (both yours and your opponent’s).
move_1_description: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokemon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
flavor_text: "It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot."

name: dugtrio
move_2_description: This attack does 20 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
flavor_text: "In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction."

name: meowth
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, draw a card.
flavor_text: "All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow."

name: persian
move_1_description: Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Has a vicious temperament. Beware if it raises its tail straight up. It is a signal that it is about to pounce and bite."

name: psyduck
move_1_description: During your opponent’s next turn, whenever they flip a coin, treat it as tails.
flavor_text: "It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers."

name: golduck
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
flavor_text: "The forelegs are webbed, helping to make it an adept swimmer. It can be seen swimming elegantly in lakes, etc."

name: mankey
move_1_description: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Flop attack’s base damage is 50.
flavor_text: "Light and agile on its feet, and ferocious in temperament. When angered, it flies into an uncontrollable frenzy."

name: primeape
move_1_description: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
move_2_description: Does 80 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It is always outrageously furious. If it gives chase, it will tenaciously track the target no matter how far."

name: growlithe
move_1_description: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
flavor_text: "Very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting."

name: arcanine
ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokemon this turn, you may move any number of Fire Energy attached to your Pokemon to this Pokemon.
move_1_description: This Pokemon can’t attack during your next turn.
flavor_text: "A Pokémon that is described in Chinese legends. It is said to race at an unbelievable speed."

name: poliwag
flavor_text: "Its slick black skin is thin and damp. A part of its internal organs can be seen through the skin as a spiral pattern."

name: poliwhirl
move_1_description: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Active Pokemon’s attacks. That Pokemon can’t use that attack during your opponent’s next turn.
move_2_description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "Its two legs are well developed. Even though it can live on the ground, it prefers living in water."

name: poliwrath
move_1_description: If this Pokemon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokemon this turn, this attach does 50 more damage.
move_2_description: Discard an Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokemon.
flavor_text: "An adept swimmer, it knows the front crawl, butterfly, and more. It is faster than the best human swimmers."

name: abra
move_1_description: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a variety of extrasensory powers even while asleep."

name: kadabra
move_1_description: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It happened one morning - a boy with extrasensory powers awoke in bed transformed into KADABRA."

name: alakazam
move_1_description: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It does not like physical attacks very  much. Instead, it freely uses extra' sensory powers to defeat foes."

name: machop
move_1_description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
move_2_description: This Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it's the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups."

name: machoke
flavor_text: "Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods."

name: machamp
ability: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon.
flavor_text: "Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds."

name: bellsprout
flavor_text: "Its bud looks like a human face. Because of the bud, it is rumored to be a type of legendary mandrake plant."

name: weepinbell
move_2_description: Your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
flavor_text: "The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything."

name: victreebel
ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokemon with their Active Pokemon.
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Burned.
flavor_text: "Lures prey into its mouth with a honeylike aroma. The helpless prey is melted with a dissolving fluid."

name: tentacool
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
flavor_text: "Its eyes are as transparent as crystals. From them, it shoots mysterious beams of light."

name: tentacruel
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
move_2_description: The Defending Pokemon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
flavor_text: "It has 80 tentacles that move about freely. They can sting, causing poisoning and sharp, stabbing pain."

name: geodude
move_1_description: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "Its round form makes it easy to pick up. Some people have used them to hurl at each other in a snowball fight."

name: graveler
move_1_description: This pokemon does 20 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "Be careful while hiking on mountain trails. GRAVELER may come rolling down the path without slowing."

name: golem
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
move_2_description: This Pokemon does 150 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "It is enclosed in a hard shell that is as rugged as slabs of rock. It sheds skin once a year to grow larger."

name: ponyta
flavor_text: "Its body is light, and its legs are incredibly powerful. It can clear Ayers Rock in one leap."

name: rapidash
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent’s next turn.
flavor_text: "It can gallop at a top speed of 150 miles per hour. It can race as fast as a bullet train while ablaze."

name: slowpoke
move_1_description: Both this Pokemon and the Defending Pokemon are now Asleep.
flavor_text: "It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail."

name: slowbro
ability: As often as you like during your turn, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your other Pokemon to this Pokemon.
move_1_description: Heal all damage from this Pokemon and remove all Special Conditions. This pokemon is now Asleep.
flavor_text: "When a SLOWPOKE went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a SHELLDER. That made it evolve into SLOWBRO."

name: magnemite
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
move_2_description: This Pokemon does 50 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "It moves while constantly hovering. It discharges THUNDER WAVE and so on from the units at its sides."

name: magneton
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
move_2_description: This Pokemon does 80 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "A linked cluster formed of several MAGNEMITE. It discharges powerful magnetic waves at high voltage."

name: farfetchd
move_1_description: This Pokemon can’t use Leek Slap during your next turn.
flavor_text: "It always walks about with a plant stalk clamped in its beak. The stalk is used for building its nest."

name: doduo
move_1_description: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour."

name: dodrio
ability: As long as this Pokemon is on your Bench, your Active pokemon’s Retreat Cost is 1 less.
move_1_description: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger."

name: seel
move_1_description: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
flavor_text: "Covered with light blue fur, its hide is thick and tough. It is active in bitter cold of minus 40 degrees Fahrenheit."

name: dewgong
move_1_description: Heal 40 damage from this Pokemon. Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
move_2_description: This Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "Its body is covered with a pure white fur. The colder the weather, the more active it becomes."

name: grimer
move_2_description: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
flavor_text: "Sludge exposed to X rays from the moon transformed into GRIMER. It loves feeding on filthy things."

name: muk
ability: As long as this pokemon is your active pokemon, ignore the effects of all Abilities.
move_1_description: The defending pokemon is now Poisoned.
flavor_text: "It is usually undetectable because it blends in with the ground. Touching it can cause terrible poisoning."

name: shellder
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the defending pokemon is now paralyzed. If tails, this attack does nothing.
flavor_text: "It is encased in a shell that is harder than diamond. Inside, however, it is surprisingly tender."

name: cloyster
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the defending pokemon is now paralyzed.
move_2_description: Flip 5 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking."

name: gastly
move_1_description: During your opponent’s next turn, if this pokemon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack, discard an energy attached to the attacking pokemon.
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Asleep.
flavor_text: "A being that exists as a thin gas. It can topple an Indian elephant by enveloping the prey in two seconds."

name: haunter
move_1_description: Your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Asleep.
move_2_description: If your opponent’s Active pokemon is not Asleep, this attack does nothing.
flavor_text: "If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, HAUNTER is there."

name: gengar
ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your opponent’s Pokemon to another. This Abillity can’t be used if this pokemon is affected by a Special Condition.
move_1_description: Your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Asleep.
flavor_text: "It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains."

name: onix
flavor_text: "It usually lives underground. It searches for food while boring its way through the ground at 50 miles per hour."

name: drowzee
move_2_description: Your opponent’s active pokemon is now confused.
flavor_text: "A descendent of the legendary animal baku, which is said to eat dreams. It is skilled at hypnotism."

name: hypno
move_1_description: Look at up to 3 cards from the top of either player’s deck and rearrange them as you like.
move_2_description: Your opponent’s active pokemon is now confused.
flavor_text: "It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took  away a child it hypnotized."

name: krabby
flavor_text: "It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets."

name: kingler
move_1_description: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
flavor_text: "Its large and hard pincer has 10,000- horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move."

name: voltorb
move_1_description: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "A life-form whose identity is unknown. It is said to SCREECH or suddenly SELFDESTRUCT."

name: electrode
ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may Knock Out this Pokemon and attach it to one of your E Pokemon as a Special Energy card. This card provides 2 E Energy only while this card is attached to a Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of 'The Bomb Ball.'"

name: exeggcute
ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this pokemon is in your discard pile, you may put this pokemon into your hand.
flavor_text: "Even though it appears to be eggs of some sort, it was discovered to be a life- form more like plant seeds."

name: exeggutor
move_2_description: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to this pokemon. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "It is called 'The Walking Tropical Rainforest.' Each of the nuts has a face and a will of its own."

name: cubone
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
flavor_text: "It wears the skull of its dead mother on its head. When it becomes lonesome, it is said to cry loudly."

name: marowak
move_1_description: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s pokemon. (Don’t apply weakness and resistance for benched pokemon.)
move_2_description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones."

name: hitmonlee
move_1_description: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokemon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
flavor_text: "The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick."

name: hitmonchan
flavor_text: "The spirit of a pro boxer has infused this Pokémon. It throws punches that are faster than a bullet train."

name: lickitung
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the defending pokemon is now paralyzed.
move_2_description: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokemon.
flavor_text: "Its tongue is twice the length of its body. It can be moved like an arm for grabbing food and attacking."

name: koffing
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Asleep. If tails, your opponent’s active pokemon is now confused.
flavor_text: "Its thin, balloon-like body is inflated by horribly toxic gases. It reeks when it is nearby."

name: weezing
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Asleep. If tails, your opponent’s active pokemon is now confused.
move_2_description: This Pokemon does 90 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "Very rarely, a sudden mutation can result in two small KOFFING twins becoming conjoined as a WEEZING."

name: rhyhorn
flavor_text: "Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging TACKLES."

name: rhydon
move_1_description: This pokemon does 10 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn."

name: chansey
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks during your opponent’s next turn.
move_2_description: This Pokemon does 80 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "It lays several eggs a day. The eggs are apparently rich in nutrients and extremely delicious."

name: tangela
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
move_2_description: Your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
flavor_text: "Blue plant vines cloak the Pokémon's identity in a tangled mass. It entangles anything that gets close."

name: kangaskhan
move_1_description: Draw a card.
move_2_description: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of of heads.
flavor_text: "The female raises its offspring in a pouch on its belly. It is skilled at attacking using COMET PUNCH."

name: horsea
move_1_description: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent’s next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
flavor_text: "It maintains balance using its tail, which is wound up like a coil. It may spray ink from its mouth."

name: seadra
move_1_description: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent’s next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
flavor_text: "Its body bristles with sharp spikes. Carelessly trying to touch it could cause fainting from the spikes."

name: goldeen
move_1_description: This attack does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots."

name: seaking
move_2_description: Flip 2 coins. If both are heads, the Defending Pokemon is Knocked Out.
flavor_text: "The horn on its head is sharp like a drill. It bores a hole in a boulder to make its nest."

name: staryu
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.
flavor_text: "It appears in large numbers by seashores. At night, its central core flashes with a red light."

name: starmie
ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, put 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can’t choose a card you discarded with the effect of this Ability.)
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
flavor_text: "This Pokémon has a geometric body. Because of its body, the locals suspect that it is an alien creature."

name: Mr.Mime
ability: If an attack would deal 50 or more damage to this pokemon, you may prevent that damage. This Ability can’t be used if this pokemon is affected by a Special Condition.
move_1_description: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "It is adept at conning people. It is said to be able to create walls out of thin air by miming."

name: scyther
move_2_description: During your next turn, this Pokemon can’t use this attack.
flavor_text: "It tears and shreds prey with its wickedly sharp scythes. It very rarely spreads its wings to fly."

name: jynx
ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this pokemon is on your Bench, you may heal 10 damage from your Active pokemon.
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
flavor_text: "It speaks using a language that sounds human. Research is under way to determine what is being said."

name: electabuzz
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage. If tails, this Pokemon does 10 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "It loves to feed on strong electricity. It occasionally appears around large power plants and so on."

name: magmar
move_2_description: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "Found near the mouth of a volcano. This fire-breather's body temperature is nearly 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit."

name: pinsir
move_2_description: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack has 30 base damage instead.
flavor_text: "Its two long pincer horns are powerful. Once they grip an enemy, they won't release until the foe is torn."

name: tauros
move_1_description: This pokemon does 10 damage to itself.
move_2_description: Flip a coin for each damage counter on this pokemon. This attack does 30 dmagae times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "When it is about to TACKLE, it whips its body repeatedly with its three long tails."

name: magikarp
move_1_description: This attack does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokémon in the world."

name: gyarados
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
move_2_description: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.
flavor_text: "It has an extremely aggressive nature. The HYPER BEAM it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets."

name: lapras
flavor_text: "Its high intelligence enables it to understand human speech. It likes to ferry people on its back."

name: ditto
ability: If Ditto is your Active Pokemon, treat it as if it were the same card as the Defending Pokemon, including type, Hit Points, Weakness, and so on, except Ditto can’t evolve, always has this Ability, and you may treat any Energy attached to Ditto as Energy of any type. This Abillity can’t be used if this pokemon is affected by a Special Condition.
flavor_text: "It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life- forms."

name: eevee
move_1_description: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.
flavor_text: "An extremely rare Pokémon that may evolve in a number of different ways depending on stimuli."

name: vaporeon
ability: Each of your pokemon in play are now a Water type in addition to its other types.
flavor_text: "Its body's cellular structure is similar to the molecular composition of water. It can melt invisibly in water."

name: jolteon
ability: Each of your pokemon in play are now an Electric type in addition to its other types.
move_1_description: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "If it is angered or startled, the fur all over its body bristles like sharp needles that pierce foes."

name: flareon
ability: Each of your pokemon in play are now a Fire type in addition to its other types.
move_1_description: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It has a flame bag inside its body. After inhaling deeply, it blows out flames of nearly 3,100 degrees Fahrenheit."

name: porygon
flavor_text: "Using the most advanced technologies, scientists finally succeeded in making the first artificial Pokémon."

name: omanyte
ability: Any damage done to this Pokemon is reduced by 20.
flavor_text: "A prehistoric Pokémon that lived in the primordial sea, it swims by twisting its 10 tentacles about."

name: omastar
ability: Any damage done to this Pokemon is reduced by 20.
flavor_text: "Its tentacles are highly developed as if they are hands and feet. As soon as it ensnares prey, it bites."

name: kabuto
ability: Any damage done to this Pokemon is reduced by 20.
flavor_text: "This Pokémon was regenerated from the fossil of an ancient creature. It protects itself with a hard shell."

name: kabutops
move_1_description: Heal from this Pokemon the same amount of damage done to your opponent’s Pokemon.
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage.
flavor_text: "It swims freely through water. It catches prey with its scythe-like arms and drains the victim's fluids."

name: aerodactyl
ability: Your pokemon’s attacks do 10 more damage to the active pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
flavor_text: "It was regenerated from a dinosaur's genetic matter that was found in amber. It flies with high-pitched cries."

name: snorlax
move_1_description: Heal all damage from this Pokemon and remove all Special Conditions. This pokemon is now Asleep.
move_2_description: You can only use this attack if this Pokemon is Asleep.
flavor_text: "It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep."

name: articuno
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokemon. If tails, this attack does 40 damage to each of your own Benched Pokemon.
flavor_text: "One of the legendary bird Pokémon. With its long tail trailing behind, its flying form is magnificent."

name: zapdos
move_1_description: This Pokemon does 30 damage to itself.
move_2_description: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "One of the legendary bird Pokémon. While it is flying, it makes crackling and snapping sounds."

name: moltres
move_1_description: You may discard any number of Fire Energy cards attached to Moltres when you use this attack. If you do, discard that many cards from the top of your opponent’s deck.
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
flavor_text: "One of the legendary bird Pokémon. Those seeing it are overwhelmed by its orange wings that seem to be on fire."

name: dratini
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the defending pokemon is now paralyzed.
flavor_text: "Even the young can exceed 6.5 feet in length. It grows larger by repeatedly shedding skin."

name: dragonair
move_1_description: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It is said to live in seas and lakes. Even though it has no wings, it has been seen flying occasionally."

name: dragonite
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
move_2_description: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "It can fly in spite of its big and bulky physique. It circles the globe in just 16 hours."

name: mewtwo
move_1_description: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokemon.
move_2_description: During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon. If 1 of your Pokemon used Barrier during your last turn, this attack can’t be used.
flavor_text: "A Pokémon whose genetic code was repeatedly recombined for research. It turned vicious as a result."

name: mew
ability: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon by your opponent’s Evolution Pokemon.
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
flavor_text: "A Pokémon of South America that was thought to have been extinct. It is very intelligent and learns any move."

name: chikorita
move_1_description: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "Its pleasantly aromatic leaves have the ability to check the humidity and temperature."

name: bayleef
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
move_2_description: Heal from this Pokemon the same amount of damage done to your opponent’s Pokemon.
flavor_text: "A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck. The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health."

name: meganium
ability: If this Pokemon ‘s remaining HP is 50 or less, its attacks do 70 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
move_1_description: Heal from this Pokemon the same amount of damage done to your opponent’s Pokemon.
flavor_text: "MEGANIUM's breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants. It can make them healthy again."

name: cyndaquil
move_1_description: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent’s next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
flavor_text: "It usually stays hunched over. If it is angry or surprised, it shoots flames out of its back."

name: quilava
move_1_description: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent’s next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokemon is now Burned.
flavor_text: "This Pokémon is fully covered by nonflammable fur. It can withstand any kind of fire attack."

name: typhlosion
ability: If this Pokemon ‘s remaining HP is 50 or less, its attacks do 70 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
move_1_description: Both this Pokemon and the Defending Pokemon are now Burned.
flavor_text: "It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions."

name: totodile
move_1_description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "It is small but rough and tough. It won't hesitate to take a bite out of anything that moves."

name: croconaw
move_2_description: Discard an Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokemon.
flavor_text: "It opens its huge jaws wide when attacking. If it loses any fangs while biting, they grow back in."

name: feraligatr
ability: If this Pokemon ‘s remaining HP is 50 or less, its attacks do 70 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
move_1_description: During your next turn, this Pokemon can’t attack.
flavor_text: "It is hard for it to support its own weight out of water, so it gets down on all fours. But it moves fast."

name: sentret
move_1_description: Look at the top 2 cards of your opponent’s deck. Put them back in the same order.
flavor_text: "It stands on its tail so it can see a long way. If it spots an enemy, it cries loudly to warn its kind."

name: furret
ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this ability. Look at the top card of your opponent’s deck.
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
flavor_text: "There is no telling where its tail begins. Despite its short legs, it is quick at hunting RATTATA."

name: hoothoot
ability: This Pokémon can’t be Asleep.
flavor_text: "It has a perfect sense of time. Whatever happens, it keeps rhythm by precisely tilting its head in time."

name: noctowl
ability: This Pokémon can’t be Asleep.
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent’s next turn.
flavor_text: "When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power."

name: ledyba
move_2_description: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of of heads.
flavor_text: "When the weather turns cold, numerous LEDYBA gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm."

name: ledian
move_2_description: You may switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you do, move as many Energy cards attached to this Pokemon as you like to the new Active Pokemon.
flavor_text: "The star patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky."

name: spinarak
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
flavor_text: "It spins a web using fine--but durable-- thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped."

name: ariados
ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this ability. Both active pokemon, except for Grass pokemon, are now poisoned.
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
flavor_text: "A single strand of a special string is endlessly spun out of its rear. The string leads back to its nest."

name: crobat
move_1_description: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
move_2_description: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of of heads.
flavor_text: "The development of wings on its legs enables it to fly fast but also makes it tough to stop and rest."

name: chinchou
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.
move_2_description: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
flavor_text: "On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights."

name: lanturn
ability: This Pokémon’s attacks do an additional 10 damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
flavor_text: "It blinds prey with an intense burst of light, then swallows the immobilized prey in a single gulp."

name: pichu
flavor_text: "Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself."

name: cleffa
flavor_text: "When numerous meteors illuminate the night sky, sightings of CLEFFA strangely increase."

name: igglybuff
flavor_text: "Its extremely flexible and elastic body makes it bounce continuously--anytime, anywhere."

name: togepi
flavor_text: "A proverb claims that happiness will come to anyone who can make a sleeping TOGEPI stand up."

name: togetic
flavor_text: "It grows dispirited if it is not with kind people. It can float in midair without moving its wings."

name: natu
ability: If this Pokemon is Burned or Poisoned by an opponent’s attack (even if it is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now affected by the same Special Conditions.
flavor_text: "It usually forages for food on the ground but may, on rare occasions, hop onto branches to peck at shoots."

name: xatu
ability: If this Pokemon is Burned or Poisoned by an opponent’s attack (even if it is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now affected by the same Special Conditions.
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s active Pokemon is now Confused.
flavor_text: "In South America, it is said that its right eye sees the future and its left eye views the past."

name: mareep
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
flavor_text: "Its fleece grows continually. In the summer, the fleece is fully shed, but it grows back in a week."

name: flaaffy
move_2_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
flavor_text: "Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps it from being electrocuted."

name: ampharos
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, this attack does 40 more damage.
flavor_text: "The bright light on its tail can be seen far away. It has been treasured since ancient times as a beacon."

name: bellossom
flavor_text: "Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound."

name: marill
flavor_text: "The end of its tail serves as a buoy that keeps it from drowning, even in a vicious current."

name: azumarill
flavor_text: "When it plays in water, it rolls up its elongated ears to prevent their insides from getting wet."

name: sudowoodo
flavor_text: "It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining."

name: politoed
flavor_text: "Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing."

name: hoppip
flavor_text: "Its body is so light, it must grip the ground firmly with its feet to keep from being blown away."

name: skiploom
flavor_text: "It spreads its petals to absorb sunlight. It also floats in the air to get closer to the sun."

name: jumpluff
flavor_text: "It drifts on seasonal winds and spreads its cotton-like spores all over the world  to make more offspring."

name: aipom
flavor_text: "It lives atop tall trees. When leaping from branch to branch, it deftly uses its tail for balance."

name: sunkern
flavor_text: "It lives by drinking only dewdrops from under the leaves of plants. It is said that it eats nothing else."

name: sunflora
move_1_description: Attach up to 2 Grass Energy cards from your hand to 1 of your Grass Pokemon.
move_2_description: This Pokemon can’t use this attack during your next turn.
flavor_text: "In the daytime, it rushes about in a hectic manner, but it comes to a complete stop when the sun sets."

name: yanma
flavor_text: "Its large eyes can scan 360 degrees. It looks in all directions to seek out insects as its prey."

name: wooper
flavor_text: "When it walks around on the ground, it coats its body with a slimy, poisonous film."

name: quagsire
flavor_text: "Due to its relaxed and carefree attitude, it often bumps its head on boulders and boat hulls as it swims."

name: espeon
ability: Each of your pokemon in play are now a Psychic type in addition to its other types.
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
flavor_text: "By reading air currents, it can predict things such as the weather or its foe's next move."

name: umbreon
ability: Each of your pokemon in play are now a Dark type in addition to its other types.
move_1_description: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent’s Active Pokemon.
flavor_text: "When darkness falls, the rings on its body begin to glow, striking fear in the hearts of anyone nearby."

name: murkrow
flavor_text: "It is said that when chased, it lures its attacker onto dark mountain trails where the foe will get lost."

name: slowking
ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, move an Energy from your opponent’s Active pokemon to 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
move_1_description: During your next turn, this pokemon’s Psych Up attack does 40 more damage.
flavor_text: "When its head was bitten, toxins entered SLOWPOKE's head and unlocked an extraordinary power."

name: misdreavus
flavor_text: "It loves to bite and yank people's hair from behind without warning, just to see their shocked reactions."

name: unown
flavor_text: "Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning."

name: wobbuffet
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, move all damage counters from this Pokemon to the Defending Pokemon.
flavor_text: "To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack."

name: girafarig
flavor_text: "Its tail, which also contains a small brain, may bite on its own if it notices an alluring smell."

name: pineco
flavor_text: "It hangs and waits for flying-insect prey to come near. It does not move about much on its own."

name: forretress
flavor_text: "It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away."

name: dunsparce
move_1_description: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks during your opponent’s next turn.
flavor_text: "If spotted, it escapes by burrowing with its tail. It can hover just slightly using its wings."

name: gligar
flavor_text: "It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack."

name: steelix
move_1_description: During your opponent’s next turn, this pokemon has no weakness.
move_2_description: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 100 damage times the number of heads.
flavor_text: "It is said that if an ONIX lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like."

name: snubbull
flavor_text: "It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways."

name: granbull
flavor_text: "Because its fangs are too heavy, it always keeps its head tilted down. However, its BITE is powerful."

name: qwilfish
flavor_text: "The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting."

name: scizor
flavor_text: "Its wings are not used for flying. They are flapped at high speed to adjust its body temperature."

name: shuckle
flavor_text: "It stores BERRIES inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still."

name: heracross
flavor_text: "Usually docile, but if disturbed while sipping honey, it chases off the intruder with its horn."

name: sneasel
flavor_text: "Vicious in nature, it drives PIDGEY from their nests and feasts on the eggs that are left behind."

name: teddiursa
flavor_text: "Before food becomes scarce in wintertime, its habit is to hoard food in many hidden locations."

name: ursaring
flavor_text: "With its ability to distinguish any smell, it unfailingly finds all food buried deep underground."

name: slugma
flavor_text: "A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places."

name: magcargo
flavor_text: "Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body."

name: swinub
flavor_text: "If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma."

name: piloswine
flavor_text: "If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound."

name: corsola
move_1_description: Heal 30 damage and remove all Special Conditions from this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "In a south sea nation, the people live in communities that are built on groups of these Pokémon."

name: remoraid
flavor_text: "Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a MANTINE's underside to scavenge for leftovers."

name: octillery
flavor_text: "It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fellow OCTILLERY."

name: delibird
flavor_text: "It nests at the edge of sharp cliffs. It spends all day carrying food to its awaiting chicks."

name: mantine
flavor_text: "Swimming freely in open seas, it may fly out of the water and over the waves if it builds up enough speed."

name: skarmory
flavor_text: "After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns."

name: houndour
flavor_text: "To corner prey, they check each other's location using barks that only they can understand."

name: houndoom
flavor_text: "Upon hearing its eerie howls, other Pokémon get the shivers and head straight back to their nests."

name: kingdra
ability: As long as this Pokemon is on your Bench, your pokemon have no weakness.
move_1_description: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Benched pokemon and switch it with the defending pokemon.
flavor_text: "It sleeps deep on the ocean floor to build its energy. It is said to cause tornadoes as it wakes."

name: phanpy
flavor_text: "As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying."

name: donphan
flavor_text: "The longer and bigger its tusks, the higher its rank in its herd. The tusks take a long time to grow."

name: porygon2
move_1_description: Choose 1 Energy type. This pokemon’s Resistance is now that type until the end of your next turn.
move_2_description: This Pokemon can’t use this attack during your next turn.
flavor_text: "Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed."

name: stantler
flavor_text: "Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand."

name: smeargle
move_1_description: If this Pokemon was attacked last turn, use that attack on the Defending Pokemon.
flavor_text: "Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back."

name: tyrogue
flavor_text: "Even though it is small, it can't be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning."

name: hitmontop
flavor_text: "It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground."

name: smoochum
flavor_text: "It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone."

name: elekid
flavor_text: "Even in the most vicious storm, this Pokémon plays happily if thunder rumbles in the sky."

name: magby
flavor_text: "It is found in volcanic craters. Its body heat exceeds 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit, so don't underestimate it."

name: miltank
flavor_text: "If it has just had a baby, the milk it produces contains much more nutrition than usual."

name: blissey
ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, heal 30 damage from your Active Pokemon.
move_1_description: This pokemon does 60 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "It has a very compassionate nature. If it sees a sick Pokémon, it will nurse the sufferer back to health."

name: raikou
flavor_text: "This Pokémon races across the land while barking a cry that sounds like crashing thunder."

name: entei
flavor_text: "A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears."

name: suicune
flavor_text: "This Pokémon races across the land. It is said that north winds will somehow blow whenever it appears."

name: larvitar
move_1_description: This pokemon does 10 damage to itself.
flavor_text: "It is born deep underground. It can't emerge until it has entirely consumed the soil around it."

name: pupitar
move_2_description: This attack does 20 damage to each non-fighting type Pokemon (both yours and your opponent’s).
flavor_text: "Even sealed in its shell, it can move freely. Hard and fast, it has outstanding destructive power."

name: tyranitar
move_1_description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.
move_2_description: Discard an Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokemon.
flavor_text: "Its body can't be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies."

name: lugia
flavor_text: "It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm."

name: ho-oh
flavor_text: "A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies."

name: celebi
ability: When this Pokemon is Knocked Out, flip a coin. If heads, shuffle this Pokemon and all cards attached to it into your deck.
move_1_description: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.
flavor_text: "When CELEBI disappears deep in a forest, it is said to leave behind an egg it brought from the future."
